p: The semi-quantitative ( Table 1) and quantitative data ( Table 2) are expressed as the mean of three determinations. Statistical significance was evaluate applying one-way ANOVA and F-test ( p < 0.05) using Microsoft Excel statistical software; means were then compared by Fisher’s LSD test using the DSAASTAT excel ® VBA macro, version 1.1 (Onofri, A.; Pisa, Italy, 2007).
